title: Alber Elbaz on the Industry That Creates Dreams | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Alber Elbaz on the Industry That Creates Dreams | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: Renowned fashion journalist Suzy Menkes once called superstar designer Alber Elbaz a "master of improvisation." That instinctual, passionate disposition was on full display onstage at VOICES, as Elbaz waxed on lyrically about what he’s learned since h
description:
Renowned fashion journalist Suzy Menkes once called superstar designer Alber Elbaz a "master of improvisation." That instinctual, passionate disposition was on full display onstage at VOICES, as Elbaz waxed on lyrically about what he’s learned since his abrupt firing from Lanvin in 2015. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
